sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container,Row ,Col , Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //static data later will call const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from our objects const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city , distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = {day:'numeric',month:'long',year:'numeric'} return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating } {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) :( ({reviews.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} per Perosn {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* Reviews section start */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=>(
naveen

{new Date('2023-01-18').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

) ) }
{/* Reviews section End */}
) } export default TourDetails;
